info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 25 at 1:35PM MST until July 25 at 5:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 530 PM MST. * At 135 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated numerous thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly over sections of Antares Road, Pierce Ferry Road, Stockton Hill Road and Buck and Doe Road. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Antares Road, Pierce Ferry Road, Buck and Doe Road and Stockton Hill Road FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
